column4: can i have some help with screen resoulutions? ubuntu set the xorg conf up fine, all the modes are what they're supposed to be, but i can't select my native res 1280x800 from gnome :s
there is a nice FAQ on the Ubuntu Wiki about that IIRC
oh. thanks. i'll have a look
you will need a 1280x800 modeline, just web search for it.
